roleset.name: get rid of, make illegal

role.descr: entity getting rid of, outlawing something

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Secretary of State for Trade and Industry Nicholas Ridley said later in the day that the government would abolish its golden share in Jaguar, the luxury auto maker being stalked by General Motors and Ford Motor.
example.arg: its golden share in Jaguar, the luxury auto maker being stalked by General Motors and Ford Motor

roleset.note: Member of Vncls remove-10.1. No Fncls.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'abolish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
